To apply a mutant on disk:
    mutmut apply <id>

To show a mutant:
    mutmut show <id>


Survived ğŸ™ (2)

---- foo.py (2) ----

# mutant 1
--- foo.py
+++ foo.py
@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
 
 def foo(a, b):
-    result = a + b
+    result = a - b
     return result
 

# mutant 2
--- foo.py
+++ foo.py
@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
 
 def foo(a, b):
-    result = a + b
+    result = None
     return result
